items.sentence: I didn\'t know that I was supposed to be here by 2:30.
I didn\'t know that you worked for a security company.
Tom drank three bottles of wine by himself last night.
Tom dreaded having to spend Christmas in the hospital.
Tom found Mary a job not too far from where she lives.
Tom had his wife Mary followed by a private detective.
The last time that happened I didn\'t know what to do.
Tom stood up and then everybody else stood up as well.
Tom suddenly got happy when Mary walked into the room.
Tom thinks it impossible for Mary to break the record.
Tom thought Mary was wasting her time studying French.
Someone who knows English well must have written this.
Tell Tom I want to see him first thing in the morning.
Are you absolutely sure it was Tom you saw doing that?
I probably would\'ve done the same thing that Tom did.
I promise you that I\'ll be there anytime you need me.
Marriage isn\'t a subject that interests young people.
Are you sure you don\'t want me to wait here with Tom?
Are you sure you don\'t want to go to Boston with Tom?
Tom ran out of matches so he couldn\'t light the fire.
